pixi.InteractionManager

type
class
metadata
:native
"PIXI.InteractionManager"

Constructor

new(stage : pixi.display.Stage)
parameters
stage {Stage} The stage to handle interactions
The interaction manager deals with mouse and touch events. Any DisplayObject can be interactive if its interactive parameter is set to true This manager also supports multitouch.

Instance Variables

currentCursorStyle : String

The css style of the cursor that is being used

interactiveItems : Array<Dynamic>

An array containing all the iterative items from the our interactive tree

last : Float

mouse : InteractionData

the mouse data

mouseOut : Bool

Is set to true when the mouse is moved out of the canvas

mousedown : InteractionData -> Void

mousemove : InteractionData -> Void

mouseout : InteractionData -> Void

mouseoverEnabled : Bool

mouseup : InteractionData -> Void

pool : Array<Dynamic>

tiny little interactiveData pool !

resolution : Float

stage : pixi.display.Stage

a reference to the stage

touchend : InteractionData -> Void

touchmove : InteractionData -> Void

touchs : Dynamic

an object that stores current touches (InteractionData) by id reference

touchstart : InteractionData -> Void
